mapper.select: SELECT p.post_idx, JSON_ARRAYAGG( JSON_OBJECT( 'reply_idx', r.reply_idx, 'mem_idx', r.mem_idx, 'mem_id', m.mem_id, -- member 테이블에서 가져온 ID 'reply_content', r.reply_content, 'reply_time', r.reply_time, 'reply_update', r.reply_update ) ) AS replyList FROM post p LEFT JOIN reply r ON p.post_idx = r.post_idx LEFT JOIN mem m ON r.mem_idx = m.mem_idx GROUP BY p.post_idx ORDER BY p.post_idx;
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content=#{reply_content} , reply_update=now() where reply_idx=#{reply_idx}
